headline: HII to Participate in Bernstein’s 41st Annual Strategic Decisions Conference on May 28
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., May 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) will participate in Bernstein’s Strategic Decisions Conference on May 28. A conversation with HII President and CEO Chris Kastner will begin at 3:30 p.m. Eastern time and will be webcast on ir.hii.com. About HII HII is a global, all-domain defense provider.
